article.title: Cornet Technology Awarded U.S. Navy Maritime Embedded GPS Adapter Contract
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: The communications division of Cornet Technologies Incorporated has been awarded a contract to develop next-generation maritime embedded global positioning system adapters (MEGA) for the U.S. Navy Space and Naval Warfare (SPAWAR) Systems Center in San Diego. The new MEGA is a versa module Europe (VME) card that hosts the Navy's critical global positioning receiver system application module.
